channel.title: Channel 4 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Channel 4 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Farhana Bhula Named Director of Film4
item.description: “Farhana has been a key part of Film4’s success for the last three years” and will be tasked with overseeing “a new exciting era and success for our filmmakers and the Film4 brand on the world stage.”

item.title: Farhana Bhula Named Director of Film4
item.description: “Farhana has been a key part of Film4’s success for the last three years” and will be tasked with overseeing “a new exciting era and success for our filmmakers and the Film4 brand on the world stage.”

item.title: Political Drama ‘Number 10’ On Its Way From ‘Sherlock’ Creator Steven Moffat and Channel 4 (Exclusive)
item.description: “The government will be fictional, but the problems will be real,” reads a plot synopsis for Moffat’s new show, set inside the British prime minister’s official residence.

item.title: Political Drama ‘Number 10’ On Its Way From ‘Sherlock’ Creator Steven Moffat and Channel 4 (Exclusive)
item.description: “The government will be fictional, but the problems will be real,” reads a plot synopsis for Moffat’s new show, set inside the British prime minister’s official residence.

item.title: Nicola Coughlan to Lead New Installment of Channel 4 Anthology Series ‘I Am’
item.description: The female-led series has been recommissioned for a fourth season, with Coughlan set to star in the two-episode ‘I Am Helen’ opposite ‘Peaky Blinders’ star Joe Cole.

item.title: Nicola Coughlan to Lead New Installment of Channel 4 Anthology Series ‘I Am’
item.description: The female-led series has been recommissioned for a fourth season, with Coughlan set to star in the two-episode ‘I Am Helen’ opposite ‘Peaky Blinders’ star Joe Cole.
